DRS Download Tools¶

DRS Pull¶

class gen3.tools.download.drs_download.DRSObjectType(value)[source]¶

Bases: str, enum.Enum

An enumeration.

class gen3.tools.download.drs_download.DownloadManager(hostname: str, auth: gen3.auth.Gen3Auth, download_list: List[gen3.tools.download.drs_download.Downloadable])[source]¶

Bases: object

Class to assist in downloading a list of Downloadables which at a minimum is a json manifest of DRS object ids Args

  • hostname: Gen3 commons home commons

  • auth: Gen3 authentication

  • list of objects to download

  • DRS resolution strategy

download(object_list: List[gen3.tools.download.drs_download.Downloadable], save_directory: str = '.') → Dict[str, Any][source]¶

  • load the object ids

  • use Gen3Auth to send request to host WTS

  • get list of external oidc

  • loop:

    • process manifest entry getting and cache WTS token as needed

    • use token and DRS endpoint to get pre-signed URL

    • download file

returns: list of files requests and results.

get_fresh_token(drs_hostname: str) → Optional[str][source]¶

Will return and or refresh and return a WTS token if hostname is known otherwise returns None.

resolve_objects(object_list: List[gen3.tools.download.drs_download.Downloadable])[source]¶

Given an object list, resolve the DRS hostnames and @param object_list: @return:

class gen3.tools.download.drs_download.DownloadStatus(filename: str, status: str = 'pending', start_time: Optional[datetime.datetime] = None, end_time: Optional[datetime.datetime] = None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Stores the download status of objectIDs.

Status is “pending” until it is downloaded or an error occurs.

class gen3.tools.download.drs_download.Manifest(object_id: str, file_size: Optional[int] = - 1, file_name: Optional[str] = None, md5sum: Optional[str] = None, commons_url: Optional[str] = None)[source]¶

gen3.tools.download.drs_download.add_drs_object_info(info: gen3.tools.download.drs_download.Downloadable) → bool[source]¶

Given a downloader object fill in the required fields from the resolved hostname.

Returns True if object is valid and resolvable. In the case of a bundle, try to resolve all object_ids contained in the bundle including other objects and bundles.

gen3.tools.download.drs_download.ensure_dirpath_exists(path: pathlib.Path) → pathlib.Path[source]¶

Utility to create a directory if missing

gen3.tools.download.drs_download.extract_filename_from_object_info(object_info: dict) → Optional[str][source]¶

Extracts the filename from the object_info.

if filename is in object_info use that, otherwise try to extract it from the one of the access methods. Returns filename if found, else return None

Args

object_info: DRS object dictionary

gen3.tools.download.drs_download.get_drs_object_type(object_info: dict) → gen3.tools.download.drs_download.DRSObjectType[source]¶

From the object info determine the type of object.

Parameters

object_info – DRS object dictionary

gen3.tools.download.drs_download.get_user_auth(commons_url: str, access_token: str) → Optional[List[str]][source]¶

Get a user authz for the commons based on the access token. Returns the authz object from the user endpoint Any error will be logged and None is returned

gen3.tools.download.drs_download.parse_drs_identifier(drs_candidate: str) → Tuple[str, str, str][source]¶

Parses a DRS identifier to extract a hostname in the case of hostname based DRS a compact identifier. If neither one is recognized return an empty string and a type of ‘unknown’ Note: The regex expressions used to extract hostname or identifier has a potential for a false positive.

gen3.tools.download.drs_download.resolve_drs_hostname_from_id(object_id: str, resolved_drs_prefix_cache: dict, mds_url: str) → Optional[Tuple[str, str, str]][source]¶

Resolves and returns a DRS identifier

Returns the hostname of the DRS server if resolved, otherwise it returns None

The resolved_drs_prefix_cache is updated if needed and is a potential side effect of this call

gen3.tools.download.drs_download.resolve_objects_drs_hostname_from_id(object_ids: List[gen3.tools.download.drs_download.Downloadable], resolved_drs_prefix_cache: dict, mds_url: str) → None[source]¶

Given a list of object_ids go through list and resolve + cache any unknown
